summary: This is an automatic email reply from an individual (likely a defense attorney) indicating they are currently on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams in the case United States v. Epstein (19 Cr. 490). The reply directs urgent inquiries related to that case to an AUSA and other matters to another AUSA.

persons.name: Ronnie Abrams
persons.context: Presiding judge over the trial mentioned in the automatic email reply.

persons.name: E stein
persons.context: Referenced in the case name United States v. E stein (19 Cr. 490), which is the subject of the ongoing trial.

connections.description: Judge Abrams is presiding over the criminal case United States v. E stein.

events.title: Attorney on trial in Epstein case
events.description: An attorney (sender of the auto-reply) is actively engaged in a trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams for the case United States v. E stein.

keyFacts: The document is an automatic email reply dated August 28, 2019.
It confirms an ongoing trial for the case United States v. E stein (19 Cr. 490) before Judge Ronnie Abrams.
The sender is likely a defense attorney involved in the Epstein case, as they direct case-specific urgent inquiries to an AUSA.
